data.title: The Contender - Full Cast & Crew
data.meta_description: Learn more about the full cast of The Contender with news, photos, videos and more at TV Guide
data.text:
59 Metascore

2000

2 hr 7 mins

Drama, Suspense

R

Watchlist

Where to Watch

Joan Allen, Jeff Bridges and Gary Oldman deliver electrifying performances in this suspenseful political thriller. After the vice president dies in office, the liberal president (Bridges) nominates a female senator (Allen) for the position. But conservatives attack the nomination with accusations of deviant sexual activity in her past. Christian Slater.
